## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b2e6d7cc2b325220bbda28fea49385ce4c68d05c1646bc6a569ca62a0f27c443)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dh-io-globalelem/footnote-reference-component' @ 5.990.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
